channel.title: End of aryan?
channel.description:
I befriended a pmod while mining. When she was about to leave I popped the question
[IMG]http://img132.imageshack.us/img132/8415/untitled1bj1.jpg[/img]
This must've been what they were talking about in the "Runescape-Better then ever" Topic.
Get your autoing in while you can I suppose. The're installing a new java, programs will have to be rewritten I'm assuming.

item.title: End of aryan?
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

Arkanor:

SCAR will die when no more people want to learn to code for it, and those who already know get bored and move onto other things.

SCAR will never die, if people get bored of it, others will mvoe in and learn it!!

Well maybe not never, but you get my point…

Read full topic

item.title: End of aryan?
item.dc:creator: @Martin Martin
item.description:
@Martin wrote:

[quote=“Algas, post:16, topic:2866”]Aryan has been dying for some time now. Nothing lasts forever and i must say that I am suprised that aryan has lasted this long. (not that it is dead or anything) But aryans time will come soon…

Long live Sucks Compared to AutoRune!!![/quote]

How can scar die? If nothing lasts forever

Read full topic

item.title: End of aryan?
item.dc:creator: @BlackThursday BlackThursday
item.description:
@BlackThursday wrote:

[quote=“Cheesehunk, post:61, topic:2866”][quote author=BlackThursday link=topic=3178.msg32762#msg32762 date=1147911499]

Wow… you don’t think we ALL (except for n00bs) haven’t heard and are using SRL… don’t act like your squanto bringing corn to the pilgrims alright? And hell what I said was just a thought, some people liked kaits where everyone kinda helped each other out. As for your thoughts on SCAR, its good right now, but its still not as powerful as a javabot can be, so it will have to be improved, but for dectability sake, its perfect.

I haven’t seen you post there?
Looks to me like your a leacher for SRL…
Noobs, and Leachers, all the same thing…

Maybe im learning SCAR? ever thought of that. mostly I’ve just been posting in Mopars… i dunno guess we don’t think of these things.
[/quote]

Good luck, with the new update the colors change at every login screen…[/quote]

May exact thoughts.

Read full topic

item.title: End of aryan?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“BlackThursday, post:51, topic:2866”][quote author=Cheesehunk link=topic=3178.msg31027#msg31027 date=1147731905]
Sorry to burst your bubble, but that isn’t happening BlackThursday…

Whats with everyone saying SCAR will rise again, SCAR works perfect right now, and you can run two acounts at once with Microsoft VM (Virtual Monitor.)

SCAR has never died, and never will enver…

Anything that Runescape makes, SCAR can overcome, not like other scripting languages.

Obviously not many people here are part of:
www.villavu.com/forums
Anyone who is dreaming of an ultimate Java bot created by the ‘famous ones’ mentioned above, well this is like the same thing, but with SCAR.

It’s an include, made by some of the best SCAR scripters of all time, such as Fakawi (leader,) Mutant, Benland (Math Genius!), Dankness, Pyro, Kernel Klink, masquader, renax, Starblaster, Lorax, and many other awesome scripters!

There are plent of working scripts for SCAR now, that you can leave overnight.

Why is everyone saying they hope SCAR returns when it already has!

Visit: SRL now!
[/quote]

Wow… you don’t think we ALL (except for n00bs) haven’t heard and are using SRL… don’t act like your squanto bringing corn to the pilgrims alright? And hell what I said was just a thought, some people liked kaits where everyone kinda helped each other out. As for your thoughts on SCAR, its good right now, but its still not as powerful as a javabot can be, so it will have to be improved, but for dectability sake, its perfect.[/quote]

Exactly. Sure scar is still alive, but it could be a lot better if everyone was focused on it rather then Aryan/Other java bots. The majority of noobs will go away, and some will stay and hopefully grow up to be great scripters.

Read full topic

item.title: End of aryan?
item.dc:creator: @theghost14 theghost14
item.description:
@theghost14 wrote:

[quote=“Arkanor, post:13, topic:2866”][quote author=SETO link=topic=3178.msg30366#msg30366 date=1147653892]
lol theres a way around every thing u guys are talking like its all done there are ppl just like me who wants to take down runescape and i don’t think i little JDK update will stop them from making better cheats
[/quote]

Look, dude. If they go to the latest JDK, ANY CLIENT EDITING AT ALL will end. Period. End of story. Game over, man. No decompilers exist for that (at least not in the public domain, possibly some private ones exist).

If Aryan dies and SCAR returns, then the glory days of RS cheating shall return. Jagex is happy, the old-guard RS cheaters are happy, and the newbs all quit RS cheating because “OMG SCAR IS TOO HARD TO USE OMG OMG OMG OMG :(”[/quote]

This is extacly why i love aryan went down because theres no more fucking noobs

Read full topic

Yup, this might rfeally be the end of aryan, who cares?
There’ll be new bots…

item.description:

Whats with everyone saying SCAR will rise again, SCAR works perfect right now, and you can run two acounts at once with Microsoft VM (Virtual Monitor.)

SCAR has never died, and never will enver…

Anything that Runescape makes, SCAR can overcome, not like other scripting languages.

Obviously not many people here are part of:
www.villavu.com/forums
Anyone who is dreaming of an ultimate Java bot created by the ‘famous ones’ mentioned above, well this is like the same thing, but with SCAR.

It’s an include, made by some of the best SCAR scripters of all time, such as Fakawi (leader,) Mutant, Benland (Math Genius!), Dankness, Pyro, Kernel Klink, masquader, renax, Starblaster, Lorax, and many other awesome scripters!

There are plent of working scripts for SCAR now, that you can leave overnight.

Why is everyone saying they hope SCAR returns when it already has!

Visit: SRL now![/quote]

Wow… you don’t think we ALL (except for n00bs) haven’t heard and are using SRL… don’t act like your squanto bringing corn to the pilgrims alright? And hell what I said was just a thought, some people liked kaits where everyone kinda helped each other out. As for your thoughts on SCAR, its good right now, but its still not as powerful as a javabot can be, so it will have to be improved, but for dectability sake, its perfect.

item.description:

[quote=“Cheesehunk, post:49, topic:2866”][quote author=PaulT link=topic=3178.msg31068#msg31068 date=1147733666]

PaulT, I know SCAR has never left, and never will…

I know you know, I was just agreeing ;).)
[/quote]

Oh, my bad

I knew I was gonna make myself look dumb there.

If SCAR was realeased to a more general population, like Delphi, I think it has a lot of potential, not just for Runescape![/quote]

I agree with ya there…I use SCAR for alot of things besides runescape…its easy to script for, and works perfectly
I wish Kaitnieks would come back

item.title: End of aryan?
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

[quote=“Cheesehunk, post:46, topic:2866”]Everyone is saying they are doing this to ruin Runescape, Huh? I’m pretty sure you would have never autoed in the first place if it wasn’t for Runescape.

Sure, some people like a little extra cash in there pocket, I understand that, but I just think the java bots are getting a little overused…[/quote]

Well, I completely agree with the sentiment of ruining Runescape. I think it’s a great idea to ruin Runescape. Why? Because they have already killed the original game that made them great, and now just run a glossy, ugly, shitty game which has no style and no heart so addicts can get their fix, and Jagex can get rich.

[qipte]
What ever happened to Shocker? He made that one Client using SCAR :eek:
Now that is what I call wicked forms, but he just like dissapeared…
[/quote]

Yeah, the only people who have the ability to make great cheats, don’t want to make great cheats :S.

(By the way, QFT means quoted for truth. I was agreeing with everything you said. I’m not since you understood that because:

PaulT, I know SCAR has never left, and never will...
I know you know, I was just agreeing ;).)

Read full topic

item.title: End of aryan?
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

PaulT, I know SCAR has never left, and never will…

Sure, there are great bot developers who sometimes appear out of nowhere, and bots are good, but I think it is getting a little overdone now.

Everyone is saying they are doing this to ruin Runescape, Huh? I’m pretty sure you would have never autoed in the first place if it wasn’t for Runescape.

Sure, some people like a little extra cash in there pocket, I understand that, but I just think the java bots are getting a little overused…

If there wasn’t so many leechers it would be fine!
Anyway, just my opnion…

What ever happened to Shocker? He made that one Client using SCAR :eek:
Now that is what I call wicked forms, but he just like dissapeared…

Read full topic

Whats with everyone saying SCAR will rise again, SCAR works perfect right now, and you can run two acounts at once with Microsoft VM (Virtual Monitor.)

SCAR has never died, and never will enver…

It’s an include, made by some of the best SCAR scripters of all time, such as Fakawi (leader,) Mutant, Benland (Math Genius!), Dankness, Pyro, Kernel Klink, masquader, renax, Starblaster, Lorax, and many other awesome scripters!

There are plent of working scripts for SCAR now, that you can leave overnight.

Why is everyone saying they hope SCAR returns when it already has!

Visit: SRL now![/quote]

QFT.

SCAR has always been there and always will.

But that doesn’t mean people won’t try to develop new cheats for whatever Jagex creates.

the community will not unite

Many great bots however, have been created by single individuals who appear out of nowhere.
